name: Prince Charming
description:
…You!

How do you feel about that?  Heroic? 

Would you like to explore that further?

Take a journey through this short-scope, multi-linear, visual novel to find out.  You’ll assume the identity of a hapless Victorian gravedigger who has one magic evening to break an ominous curse... This is your one chance at romance.

By performing various acts of courtship, your goal is to woo the slumbering maiden.  You will have to make multiple decisions through this tale, bearing in mind that evil might be afoot.  Now is your chance to really be the hero and experience an unforgettable fairy tale ending.

Only true love will break the spell…

But beware: actions have consequences and sometimes...

Love is a little dirty.

  • Gorgeous  hand drawn visuals
  • Branching pathways
  • Multiple endings
  • A rollercoaster of a tale, playable in under an hour
  • You!

Content warning:  This game may contain graphic content and subject matter.  Play at your own risk.

Windows and Mac:

Download the zip file and extract the executable

Double click to run.

Linux

Download the zip file

Run the .sh file, Execute: Only Owner.

 

To play:  click to advance the story.
